summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-ninth Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East Fifty-fifth Street to a point seven hundred forty-two and one-half (742 1/2) feet north thereof, by laying a water main therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 35627; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
